titles.title: A resolution expressing support for starting and growing a family through in vitro fertilization.
A resolution expressing support for starting and growing a family through in vitro fertilization.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for in vitro fertilization (IVF) and for state laws and regulations that establish health, safety, and ethical standards for medical facilities that offer IVF and other assisted reproductive technologies.
